name: E.T.HOLD
description: E.T.Hold is used to secure the Endotracheal tube firmly in position and it avoids accidental extubation. It prevents the patient by getting the rashes and other infections caused by adhesive tapes. Thus facilitating the patient to get the oxygen uninterruptedly with much comfort

name: E.T. FIX
description: E.T.Fix is the high quality cotton tape which is used to secure the E.T.Tube. It is perfect replacement of conventional gauze Material. Ready to use.

name: T.T.HOLD
description: T.T.Hold is used to secure the tracheostomy tube gently in position. It is made up of high quality soft material which enhances the comfort of the patient. It is designed so simply thus reducing the nursing labor.

name: FOLEY FIX
description: Comfy Foley Fix is designed to secure all types of Foley Catheters. The Leg band is made up of soft non-absorbent material with Velcro fasteners. The Tabs provided in the band secures the Foley catheters and it doesn't allow the catheter to slide down. It reduces the risk of urethral erosion. It can be rotated to minimize pressure points. It maintains position on the leg, whether ambulatory or bed-ridden. It eliminates skin irritation and enhances the patient comfort.

name: TRANSDUCER BAND
description: This band is designed to secure the transducers. It facilitates to hold two transducers at a time. In normal practice, they used to secure transducer with the help of adhesive tapes, It causes the pain and allergy to the patient. But with the help of Comfy Transducer Band it totally avoids all such pains and allergies and it enhances the comfort of the patient.

name: TIEPAD For Hands and Legs
description: This product is used to restrict the movement of the restless patients admitted in the hospitals. By securing the limbs of the patients through these tiepads, it gently prevents the patient by disturbing the catheters and cannulas fitted to administer the medicine

name: POLY APRON
description: Poly Apron for Infection Control

name: POLY GOWN
description: Poly Apron with full sleeves for Infection control

name: ISOLATION GOWN
description: Isolation Gowns are made from blue non woven fabric and it offers protection against heavy fluids.

name: FOREARM SLEEVES
description: Light weight, splash resistant sleeves with elastic ends to maintain a non slip fit

name: EYE WEAR
description: Wraparound Goggles & Plastic Eyeglasses with side shields

name: SLEEVES FOR CABLES
description: Clear Plastic Sleeves for the Catheters feature advanced infection control benefits that have redefined the standard of care by reducing the risk of cross-contamination.

name: PLASTIC FORCEUPS
description: These forceps are excellent for giving mouth care to the patients. Made from blue poly-propylene with interlocking teeth which holds firmly the gauze pieces.

name: ALCOHOL  SWABS
description: Swabs with Isopropyl Alcohol for cleaning purposes

name: LINT FREE TOWELS
description: Economical, highly absorbent, Latex-free and lint free towel used for spills and clean-ups

name: SPILL CLEAN SWABS
description: Presence of solidifying agent instantly turns liquid spills into a semi-gel for a quick and safe spill recovery and provides clean and Hygiene dry enviroment.

name: BEDSHEET
description: Disposable Bedspread made of soft & non absorbent material. It eliminates the infection caused by conventional reusable bed sheets and it also prevents the hospital beds.

name: PILLOW COVERS
description: Disposable pillow covers are made of soft & non absorbent material. It eliminates the infection caused by conventional reusable pillow covers.

name: SURGEONS GOWN
description: Surgeons Gown are made from non woven fabric with two layers in front and wrap around with tie closure to the surgeons convenience with knitted cuffs.

name: PATIENT GOWN
description: These gowns are made for patient's comfort & modesty. Easy for Doctors to examine the affected body part . Made up of opaque non woven fabric, half sleeves with Velcro fasteners.

name: SHOE COVER
description: The disposable polypropylene and non woven fabric shoe covers prevents infection caused by visitors shoes.

name: UNDERPADS
description: Super absorbent material with non woven spun bond top sheet and polypropylene back sheet for incontinence protection of bedridden Patients.

name: COMFY SHEET
description: The surface consists of a super soft, white non-woven fabric that is permanent penetrable to liquids and it always feels pleasantly dry It has filled with more cotton fluff in between and it ensures the softness and more absorbency of the liquid. The non skid baking sheet with two sides wings for tucking purpose under the bed. It is very useful to shift the patients from bed to trolley.

name: CUTES UNDERPADS
description: Super absorbent material with non woven spun bond top sheet and polypropylene back sheet for incontinence protection of Infants

name: NAPPY PAD
description: Disposable baby diaper with resealable tapes and elasticated leg cuffs

name: CUTES WIPES
description: It is a dry wipe made of super soft microfab material and is also alcohol free to care for your baby's sensitive skin. Our Wipes are excellent for the use by the whole family also anytime and anywhere and can be sure of a quality product. Available in 25’s and 50’s pack.

name: CATARACT KIT
description: Cataract Kit

name: GENERAL KIT
description: General Kit

name: HIV KIT
description: Hiv Kit

name: MATERNITY KIT
description: Maternity Kit

name: NEURO KIT
description: Neuro Kit

name: OPTHALMOLOGY KIT
description: Opthalmology Kit

name: ORTHO KIT
description: Ortho Kit

name: BITE BLOCK
description: Bite Block is used to prevent the patient biting the E.T.Tube and as well as his own tongue. Bite Block avoids airway occlusion and it facilitates easy suctioning of mucus in the esophagus

name: INTUBATION STYLET
description: Malleable stylet facilitates easy intubations

name: ET CO2 CONNECTOR
description: Measures the co2

name: MATERNITY MAT
description: MATERNITY Mat is a perfect replacement for the conventional usage of Bedsheets and Rubber sheets. It is made out of pure cotton with non woven absorbent top sheet with non skid backing sheet. The bag attached to the mat collects the waste and the same can be easily disposed.

name: PERNIAL SHEET
description: It is made out of 40” x 40” non woven fabric with the hole of 10” dia in the center. It is reinforced with highly absorbent material with adhesive tape all around.

name: CESEARIAN MAT
description: The surface consists of a super soft, white non-woven fabric that is permanent penetrable to liquids and it always feels pleasantly dry It has filled with more cotton fluff in between and it ensures the softness and more absorbency of the liquid. The non skid baking sheet with two sides wings for tucking purpose under the bed. It is very useful to shift the patients from bed to trolley.
